channel.title: Well this isnt really help but..... MAYOP
channel.description:
Considering this board was related to school. I Thought it should be here.
Well My school runs via a system called "MAYOP" (Move At Your Own Pace) I Was wondering if any other school run via this system.
Basicly MAYOP is when you are not split into grades/ages. But you are split into What you work best at. For example the classes go as following:
[PRESCHOOL] [Grade1,2,3(Junior School)] [Grade4,5,6(Upper Junior)] [Grade7,8,9(Middle School)] [Grade10,11,12(Sr School)]
Dose your school run by this system? or simmiler?

item.title: Well this isnt really help but..... MAYOP
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Preschool
Primary School Y1 - Y6
Secondary School Y9 - Y12

Read full topic

item.title: Well this isnt really help but..... MAYOP
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Mine is like this:

Preschool
Kindergarten
Elementary School - Grades 1-6
Middle School - Grades 7-8
High School - Grades 9-12

However, every set of grades/years has its own school:
Preschool & Kindergarden
Elementary School
Middle School
High School

Read full topic

item.title: Well this isnt really help but..... MAYOP
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:5, topic:51204”]Mine is roughly:

Preschool
Kindergarten
Elementary School (technically includes Kindergarten though) - Grades 1-4
Middle School - Grades 5-8
Junior High School - Grades 9-10
Senior High School - Grades 11-12[/quote]
You have same names as ours but diffrent grades

Pre-School
Elementary k-4
Middle School 5-6
Junior High 7-9
High School 10-12

Read full topic
